name: Twerk Hero: A Dance Game
description:
You must use your sense of rhythm and fast reactions to move the booty in the right direction at the right time. Start from training at home and move through different locations, each with its own moves and complexity!

• 5 unique beats to dance by!

• 5 unique locations!

• Freestyle mode to just dance!

• Customizing options coming soon!

Use your imagination to create the coolest dance moves!
